---
category: news
title: "Surrey: AI to help turn dog pics into 3D models"
excerpt: "Photographs of dogs could be used to help generate 3D models more accurately, a study has revealed. Researchers at the University of Surrey taught an artificial intelligence (AI) system to predict the 3D pose from a 2D image of a dog. A myriad of virtual dogs were created using the video game Grand Theft Auto."
